entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Shoal Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:38 p.m. CDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023
